name: Strong 8-30char password
description:
Must contain at least one lower, upper, number and special character. 
http://www.cianclarke.com
content:
// The following cases should not match:
onlylowercase
ONLYUPPERCASE
!@£$%^^&*
1234567
mixedCase
mixedCaseWith$pecial
// This is too short, but would otherwise match:
fe$rs4I
// This is too long - more than one hundred twenty eight chars, but would otherwise match:
with$pecialAndNumb3rswith$pecialAndNumb3rswith$pecialAndNumb3rswith$pecialAndNumb3rswith$pecialAndNumb3rswith$specialAndNumb3rswi
// The following cases should match:
with$pecialAndNumb3rs
withObscure\Special1s
fe$rs4IS
FJ583F%7djffASIFLONGER
author: Cian Clarke
